comments:
I am running using the latest source.

I am using the dependencies as listed in the follwing WTP build page:
http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/committers/drops/I-I200605241728-200605241728/

Use Case:Add the following to a JSF-JSP page:
<h:inputText value="#{mybean.name}" disabled="false"></h:inputText>
Run Validate from the context menu of the JSP page. 

'mybean' is not registered in the faces-config. Note that the EL validator reports no problems.
I get the following exception in the console:
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.impl.ReferencedComponentXMIResourceImpl
   at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.web.componentcore.util.WebArtifactEdit.getDeploymentDescriptorRoot(WebArtifactEdit.java:305)

   at org.eclipse.jst.jsf.designtime.symbols.DefaultBeanSymbolSourceProvider.getSymbols(DefaultBeanSymbolSourceProvider.java:55)
   at org.eclipse.jst.jsf.designtime.context.DTExternalContext.getMapForScope(DTExternalContext.java:116)

In my case, seems to always be preceeded by this exception: org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.PackageNotFoundException: Package with uri 'null' not found. (platform:/resource/Test2_WebApp/WebContent/WEB-INF/web.xml, 3, 25). This is outside of JSF code and seems to be similar to https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=112925.

Note that when this occurs, the Deployment Descriptor node is not present in the project in the J2EE Project Explorer view, indicating that loading of the web.xml EMF model has already failed. Workaround is to close and re-open the project (shutting down and restarting the workbench is not a workaround, as this error occurs at workbench startup).
Root issue appears to be fixed in WTP build I-I200606090521-200606090521.
Appears to be working again under WTP RC5.
Verified working correctly under WTP RC5.
